summary: WE BELIEVE SOMETHING PUNCTURED THE FRONT LEFT WHEEL OF THE CAR WHEN DRIVEN DOWN A STREET AND THE EMERGENCY BRAKE WHEN RELEASED DID NOT STOP THE CAR. THE CAR SKID INTO PARKED CARS AND AIR BAG WAS NOT DEFLATED EVEN THOUGH IT WAS SERVICED UNDER THE AIRBAG RECALL. PASSENGER SIDEVIEW MIRROR, RIGHT BODY OF CAR IS DAMAGED, SIDE AND PORTION OF FRONT AND BACK BUMPERS BECAME DAMAGED. NO OUT OF POCKET EXPENSES MADE. THE DAMAGED CAR SITS IN OUR DRIVEWAY SOON TO BE TOWED AND SOLD FOR PARTS.
